Changelog
=========
0.5 (2013-01-14)
---------------------
- Made the dates required to have more possibilities in terms of collection queries.

0.4 (2013-01-09)
---------------------
- Added Exceptions field.

0.3 (2013-01-08)
---------------------
- Decreased the number of years on the date widget.

0.2 (2012-12-10)
---------------------
- Added booking possibilities.

0.1dev (unreleased)
-------------------

- Initial release
